Quick search

Alpine¶

class api.alpine.Alpine(host=None, port=None, username=None, password=None, is_secure=False, validate_certs=False, ca_certs=None, token=None, logging_level='WARN')¶

The main entry point for the Alpine API. Most of the API calls require a logged-in user.

get_alpine_version()¶

Returns the alpine version as a sting

Returns:Alpine version as a string
get_license_info()¶

Get the License information of Alpine

Returns:Summary of Alpine license information - expiration, user limits, add-ons
get_login_status()¶

Get the current login status from Alpine API

Returns:Current login status in JSON format
login(username, password)¶

Logs into Alpine with provided username and password

Parameters:
  • username – username to login with
  • password – password to login with
Returns:

returns a Alpine API authentication token to be used for other actions
logout()¶

Logout of the session

Returns:response of the logout session
